actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to authorize representation by Senate Legal Counsel and testimony and document production by Senate employee in Springfield Terminal Railway Co. v. United Transportation Union, No. 88-0117 P.

summary.text: Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to represent Dale Gerry and the office of Senator William S. Cohen in connection with the case of Springfield Terminal Railway Co. v. United Transportation Union. Authorizes Dale Gerry to testify and produce records relevant to the case.

titles.title: A resolution to authorize representation by Senate Legal Counsel and testimony and document production by Senate employee in Springfield Terminal Railway Co. v. United Transportation Union, No. 88-0117 P.
